name: Cheeky Life Guard
description:
X=pick up clothes

C=Throw clothes

M=mute

F=fullscreen

This was made for the Summer Game Jam in less than 48 hours. A lot went well but overall I am not that happy with the finished game. Even though the npc's are a little glitchy I learnt ALOT while programming them and this was the first game where I made my own music and sound effects:)
